talents.name: Adversary
talents.text: Upgrade the difficulty of any combat check targeting this character once per rank of Adversary.

talents.name: Against all Odds
talents.text: Once per session, if the character is incapacitated due to exceeding his wound threshold, he may perform the Against All Odds action (this action may be performed even though characters are normally barred from performing actions when incapacitated). The character makes a $bHard ($d $d $d) Resilience check$b, rolling a number of $D equal to his Force rating as part of the check. If successful, the character heals would equal to $s. The character may spend Force points $f to add $s to the result.

talents.name: Aggressive Negotiations
talents.text: Once per session, perform a $bHard ($d $d $d) Lightsaber check$b to decrease the difficulty of all Negotiation checks for the rest of the encounter by 2.
